ramen.name: White Miso Ramen
ramen.description: This is the very first miso ramen ever created at Mitsukabose—a bowl that captures our origins.The soup is made with a smooth white miso base, gently enriched with the comforting aroma of Japanese dashi. Its mild, savory flavor brings warmth to the soul with every sip.Toppings include tender slices of chashu pork, aromatic green onions, house-made chicken meatballs (tsukune), and sweet onions that enhance the broth's natural richness.Each element pairs harmoniously with the soup, offering a satisfying and balanced experience in every bite.Finished with thin noodles that gently soak up the white miso flavor, this bowl is loved by everyone—from seasoned ramen fans to children tasting miso ramen for the first time.

ramen.name: Red Miso Ramen
ramen.description: A bold and flavorful ramen with our special red miso blend. Rich in umami with a hint of spiciness.

ramen.name: Spicy Miso Ramen
ramen.description: Our popular spicy miso ramen with a perfect blend of heat and flavor. Not for the faint-hearted!
